trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see langword="Click" />, <see langword="MouseDown" /> and related events on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará los eventos <see langword="Click" />, <see langword="MouseDown" /> y los eventos relacionados en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: You must wait until an HTML document has finished loading in order to attach an event handler to the document.
trans-unit.target: Debe esperar a que un documento HTML haya terminado de cargar para adjuntar un controlador de eventos para el documento.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to attach a handler before loading has completed, the attach operation may fail.
trans-unit.target: Si intenta asociar un controlador antes de que haya finalizado la carga, se puede producir un error en la operación de adjuntar.

trans-unit.source: The best place to attach event handlers in a new document is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: Es el mejor lugar para adjuntar controladores de eventos en un nuevo documento en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code attaches event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseMove>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseUp> events on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente asocia controladores de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseMove>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.MouseUp> eventos en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This code sample assumes your project has an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código se supone que el proyecto tiene una instancia de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control denominado `WebBrowser1`.
